dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4426763U] stolen images
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, June 06, 2007 1:06 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4426763U] stolen images ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. stolen images Added by system at Wednesday, Jun 6 2007 06:04 am X-MailFrom: tenko@siteground.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Jun 6 06:04:42 2007 Received: (qmail 6081 invoked by alias); 6 Jun 2007 11:04:42 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 6077 invoked from network); 6 Jun 2007 11:04:42 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 6 Jun 2007 11:04:42 -0000 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 06 Jun 2007 06:04:42 -0500 Received: from [172.16.220.10] (helo=DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) by spooling.theplanet.com (envelope-from tenko@siteground.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HvtJh-0007Al-K1 for abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net; Wed, 6 Jun 2007 06:03:48 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from tenko@siteground.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HvtIq-0005dK-KP; Wed, 06 Jun 2007 06:03:48 -0500 Received: from chat.siteground.com ([209.85.6.4]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from tenko@siteground.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HvtIn-000Epz-OP; Wed, 06 Jun 2007 06:03:45 -0500 Received: from [85.14.21.166] (port=3896 helo=DarkLord) by chat.siteground.com with esmtpa (Exim 4.63) (envelope-from ) id 1HvtH6-0004Bd-Qt; Wed, 06 Jun 2007 06:02:02 -0500 From: "Tenko Nikolov" To: Cc: "'Luedeke, Laura '" , "'Lowe, Jon '" Subject: stolen images Date: Wed, 6 Jun 2007 14:03:34 +0300 Message-ID: <00bc01c7a82a$54be02e0$fe3a08a0$@com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_00BD_01C7A843.7A0B3AE0" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 12.0 thread-index: AceoKlNAdCvdoXeNRiuOoaPTDUqKQg== Content-Language: bg X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - chat.siteground.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - siteground.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 06 Jun 2007 11:03:48.0868 (UTC) FILETIME=[5BFBF440:01C7A82A] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multipart message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear ThePlanet Abuse Department, I am writing to you because it has come to my attention that a hosting company visionwebhosting.net, that is hosted at Texas - Dallas - Theplanet.com Internet Services Inc. uses materials from our website without having such permission. There are number of web pages like: and many more which contain the same images , page structure and information as the index and other entry web pages of SiteGround .com: The content of these pages was copy/pasted directly from our website, and only some minor changes were made like replacing the SiteGround name with their own web hosting company name, changing the price etc. We would highly appreciate if you can cooperate for the removal of the copyright abusive content from your servers! Thank you in advance! Regards, Tenko K. Nikolov Chief Technology Officer http://www.siteground.com MIME element (text/html)

Dear ThePlanet Abuse Department,

 

I am writing to you because it has come to my attention that a hosting company visionwebhosting.net, that is hosted at Texas - Dallas - Theplanet.com Internet Services Inc. uses materials from our website without having such permission.

 

There are number of web pages like:

 

<http://www.visionwebhostin g.net/wordpress-hosting.html>

<http://www.visionwebhostin g.net/phpbb-hosting.html>

<http://www.visionwebhostin g.net/php-nuke-hosting.html>

<http://www.visionwebhostin g.net/cheap-hosting.html>

 

and many more which contain the same images , page structure and information as the index and other entry web pages of SiteGround .com:

 

<http://www.siteground.com& gt;

<http://www.siteground.com/ wordpress-hosting.htm>

<http://www.siteground.com/ phpbb-hosting.htm>

<http://www.siteground.comt /php-nuke-hosting.htm>

 

 

The content of these pages was copy/pasted directly from our website, and only some minor changes were made like replacing the SiteGround name with their own web hosting company name, changing the price etc.

 

We would highly appreciate if you can cooperate for the removal of the copyright abusive content from your servers!

 

Thank you in advance!

 

Regards,

 

Tenko K. Nikolov

Chief Technology Officer

http://www.siteground.com

 

MIME element (text/plain)
